fields.label: Menu type
fields.name: menu_type
fields.instructions: Select the type of menu you want to use:

sub_fields.label: Page Link
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Link directly to a ressource on the website

sub_fields.label: Static link url
sub_fields.name: static_link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a custom URL instead. If this field is not empty, it will take precedence on the previous "Link Url" field.

sub_fields.label: Dropdown widget
sub_fields.name: dropdown_widget
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a CMS block to associate with your menu item. Once you save the page, it will appear as an configurable box underneath.

sub_fields.label: Process content
sub_fields.name: process_content
sub_fields.default_value: Discover our custom approach to make programmatic works for you
